content: In my questionnaire, I have a repeating choice item bound to a valueset. The intent is to have an answer for each of the applicable value set values. However, I don't see a way to make sure that each code in the valueset can only appear once in the answer. Am I missing something? Do I need to write a FHIRpath constraint?
Yes, that is what I would do.
And depending on how many there are, you might select checkbox as the UI item control type hint.
Sigh I must say, despite all the SDC and questionnaire extensions, I'm frustrated by how often I need to resort to coding behaviour. (Now get off my lawn!)
